Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity, membrane interaction and structural features of short arginine-rich antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Agrillo B, Porritiello A, Gratino L, Balestrieri M, Proroga YTR, Mancusi A, Cozzi L, Vicenza T, Dardano P, Miranda B, Escribá PV, Gogliettino M, Palmieri G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=50µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MBC=5.0µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=2.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=75µM),Listeria monocytogenes(MBC=18µM),Aspergillus brasiliensis ATCC 9341(MFC=>50µM),Candida albicans ATCC 14053(MFC=>50µM),Hepatitis A virus (HAV)(no activity data)
